name: pdf
description: PDF tools for bizongo, including PDF Viewer, Text and Color Extraction etc. This repo is based on pdf.js(https://github.com/mozilla/pdf.js/) for rendering the PDF and @bizongo/artwork-pdf (https://github.com/Bizongo/artwork-pdf) for extraction services.
author: Siddhesh <siddhesh.nachane@bizongo.com>

scripts.test: echo "Error: run tests from root" && exit 1
